title: I think guardian angel deserves a name change too! :)
body:
GA and abyssal scepter are both getting an icon change next patch, but ony abyssal is getting a name change. I think GA could use one too!

Some suggestions:
Guardian blade (G-b instead of G-a :P)
Guardian saber
Winged guardian.

]\'[

replies.body:
Why should they change the name though?
Guardian angel still fits the item.

Meanwhile the abyssal scepter gets an icon that turns it into a mask,thus it isn't a scepter anymore,so the name change is necessary.

You are pretty much suggesting to change the name of the item just for the sake of change.

Well, I feel it would add to clarity. It's pretty much a new item, what with the complete stat changes.

That's not to say "Guardian Angel" no longer fits, but IMHO, it would add to clarity

Well but it still has the iconic passive effect.

We had already other items already who received some big changes,without receiving changes to their names.
I feel it would cause more trouble since people might search for the name of the item and not find it in the shop because of the name change.

That's a good point too. I just figured it would make it easier to know there is a CHANGE


]\'[

I think GA is still a fine thing for it. I'm glad they are finally updating the icon, that thing has been crying out for so long to have an update, and of course what better time after they've actually updated what it does.
I think Guardian Angel is the perfect name lol
